action:
Run workloads

Execute Command: /home/BKCPkg/domains/PM/mlc-linux/ipmitool sel clear, 200
Execute Command: cat /dev/null > /var/log/messages, 200
Execute Command: /home/BKCPkg/domains/PM/mlc-linux/mlc_internal --loaded_latency -t3600 -T -X >result.log, 400000

Start pythonsv and unlock all of sockets, pchs and uncores.

Open C:\pythonsv\sapphirerapids, run below command

Execute ITP Command: unlock()
expected_results:
Each Socket and PCH to be red unlock.
If pythonsv script get some error. Please do below command.
>>>unlock()
>>>itp.forcereconfig()
>>>sv.refresh()

action:
Save pythonsv log and check UPI topolopy by below command in pythonsv:

Execute ITP Command: log(r"logpath")
Execute ITP Command: import upi.upiStatus as us
Execute ITP Command: us.printTopology()
expected_results:
The UPI Links output should be the same as UPI Topology. Any different, please Fail the test case.

For example, EGS 4_3_1 Topology:

4S6Q Topology

S0_P0 <------> S1_P1
S0_P1 <------> S3_P0
S0_P2 <------> S2_P2
S1_P0 <------> S2_P1
S1_P1 <------> S0_P0
S1_P2 <------> S3_P2
S2_P0 <------> S3_P1
S2_P1 <------> S1_P0
S2_P2 <------> S0_P2
S3_P0 <------> S0_P1
S3_P1 <------> S2_P0
S3_P2 <------> S1_P2

action:
Check UPI link speed by below command in pythonsv:

Execute ITP Command: us.printLinkSpeed()
expected_results:
For Birch Stream: Upi Link speed will be 24GT/s. Status will be Fast Mode. Tx State will be L0.
For Eagle Stream: Upi Link speed will be 16GT/s. Status will be Fast Mode. Tx State will be L0.

action:
Check UPI B/W by below command in pythonsv:

Execute ITP Command: sv.sockets.uncore.upi.upis.ktireut_ph_css.s_clm
expected_results:
For Birch Stream: Upi B/W will be 0x00000007
For Eagle Stream: Upi B/W will be 0x00000007

action:
Check UPI Errors by below command in pythonsv:

Execute ITP Command: us.printErrors()
expected_results:
The Value of below register must be 0x0, if not 0x0, please fail the test case.

kti_mc_ad
ktiph_rxl0c_err_sts
ktiph_rxloc_err_log0
ktiph_rxl0c_err_log1
ktiph_l0pexit_err
ktierrcnt0_cntr
ktierrcnt1_cntr
ktierrcnt2_cntr
kticrcerrcnt
ktiles
ktidbgerrst0
ktidbgerrst1
bios_kti_err_st
notes: These value is base on EGS platform. Will update to BHS in the future.

action:
Just end the log og pythonsv:

Execute ITP Command: nolog()

call following steps for test purpose
Execute Command: ls
Reset to: OS
Wait: 20
Reset to: UEFI SHELL
